name: A Step Into Darkness - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack of A Step Into Darkness, the indie horror game developed by GameOrchard Productions. Composed Brett James, this soundtrack DLC contains all of the music from A Step Into Darkness as well as additional tracks not featured in the original game. These are provided in a 320kbps MP3 format.

1.) What Have I Done (Prologue) (02:24)
2.) A Step into Darkness (Main Theme) (01:55)
3.) In Limbo (01:03)
4.) Meeting in the Office ( 01:57)
5.) The Corridors (01:24)
6.) Find the Tapes (02:52)
7.) Wake up, GET OUT! (01:57)
8.) A Step into Darkness (Reprise) (01:36)



Here is track one on SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/brettjamescomposer/1-what-have-i-done-prologue
